thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Busy Hotel in an Interesting Location
thread.title_full: Busy Hotel in an Interesting Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TPXB
title: Busy Hotel in an Interesting Location
text:
Overall this is a great hotel, but if you are coming to NYC to shop, have an event at Madison Square Garden or are arriving by train this is an excellent hotel.
The hotel is very busy with many people coming and going out of a small lobby. We were greeted each time we arrived and left the hotel. We were acknowledged as Hilton Honors members at check-in.
The rooms are a decent size, with a good size bathroom, refrigerators, microwaves and coffee makers.
The front desk staff is very polite.
Overall a great stay.
